entry.title: $2585 // LUXURY AFFORDABLE 1 BED at 33 WEA, 24 Hr Dmn, Gym 1 MONTH FREE
entry.content:
1 MONTH FREE RENT
Sign a New Direct Lease on This Apt (6L) by 12/31/18 &
Receive the First Month FREE on a 13 Month Lease!
(Listed rent is net effective rent, based on a gross rent of $2800 and 1 Month Free)

AFFORDABLE APARTMENT AVAILABLE - INCOME LIMITS APPLY (see below)*
GUARANTORS/INSURENT ARE NOT ACCEPTED.

Applicants combined household income must fall between specific income bracket of $97,955 and $120,615 (one person household) $97,955-$137,775 (2 person household) in order to qualify.

Maximum of 2 person household permitted. (Gross amounts represented)

This beautifully appointed one bedroom apartment is located in a full-service luxury doorman building.

FREE COLUMBUS CIRCLE SHUTTLE BUS

Floor to Ceiling Windows
Great Natural Light
Stainless Steel Appliances
Granite Counter-tops
State of the art Fitness Center
Tenant Lounge
Pets Welcome - Including Dogs up to 40lbs

Heat/Hot Water/Gas for Cooking are included in the rent.
Photos are from a model unit. Please refer to the floor plan.

Equal Opportunity Housing

All images are for representation purposes only. Actual residences may vary.
